title: A Developer is Born
desc: I began my venture into the programming with Android Development, using Udemy and Youtube tutorials

title: First App Released
desc: An interest in Cybersecurity led me to release my first app, Wifi Manager. It lets users easily see details about network connection and has accumulated several thousand downloads

title: 10k+ Downloads
desc: I released a soundboard featuring a popular political candidate, which amassed tens of thousands of downloads

title: Dipping into Web
desc: Not being able to share my apps with any iPhone friends was always dissapointing. So I started to explore the web, making a website for my local skate shop

title: Diving into Web @ M2 Labs
desc: Networking with local developers lead me to land a position with M2 Labs, working on a project that analyzed Git repositories and provided data about contributions

title: Freelancing
desc: My team networks with business owners and helps them solve modern problems with the web solutions

title: Software Engineer @ Tesla
desc: I currently work on internal solar web tools at Tesla to help sustain the world's transition to sustainable energy

title: Senior Software Engineer Tech Lead @ Homee
desc: I lead a backend team at Homee, working to bring automation to the home insurance claims process
